description:
This spacious furnished one bedroom, one bathroom apartment, comes with a King bed plus a sleeper sofa in the living room, it is great for family and friends, can accommodate up to 6 Guests. 

Private parking is available for two .
name: Beautiful & large 1Bed ❤ of queens
review: Overall she is very nice and really tried to accompany me with every question I had wish I really appreciated. However some of the pictures she has to alter then because the couch doesn't look like the couch in the picture because theirs stains on them. She keeps all her personal clothes , undergarments and shoes inside her dressers and closets which I really didn't approve because it didn't make me get the feeling like I'm in new place ? Felt more like she was living there , really didn't like that aspect  of the place but it was a very good size and the tv is very sharp and easy to work with.
